mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contest_info (bno_idx, con_title, con_prize, con_period, con_content, con_category, reg_date, con_file) VALUES (#{bno_idx}, #{con_title}, #{con_prize}, #{con_period}, #{con_content}, #{con_category}, SYSDATE, #{con_file})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM contest_info WHERE TO_DATE(SUBSTR(con_period, INSTR(con_period, '~') + 1), 'YYYY.MM.DD') >= SYSDATE
SELECT * FROM contest_info WHERE TO_DATE(SUBSTR(con_period, INSTR(con_period, '~') + 1), 'YYYY.MM.DD') < SYSDATE
